As part of the Monitoring Execution team, the Reporting, Automation and Dashboards team is responsible for the*  development, implementation and ongoing enhancement of a number of reports and dashboards that enable and inform front line risk owners and First Line of Defense partners to understand their risk management effectiveness across a number of active risk and measurement platforms.*  We are searching for a talented lead analytics consultant to develop, enhance, and implement Business Intelligence solutions (Tableau). effective monitoring of various sales and operational risks.* In this role, you will:*  Partner with business stakeholders to interpret and document requirements for reporting and dashboard
